mil3.3.11:2.2: “Yatha, maharaja, kocideva puriso visam abhisankharitva attana ca piveyya, pare ca payeyya, so attanapi dukkhito bhaveyya, parepi dukkhita bhaveyyum;
mil3.3.11:2.3: evameva kho, maharaja, idhekacco puggalo akusalam kammam cetanaya cetayitva kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjeyya.
mil3.3.11:2.4: Yepi tassa anusikkhanti, tepi kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjanti.
mil3.3.11:3.1: Yatha va pana, maharaja, kocideva puriso sappinavanitatelamadhuphanitam ekajjham abhisankharitva attana ca piveyya, pare ca payeyya, so attana sukhito bhaveyya, parepi sukhita bhaveyyum;
mil3.3.11:3.2: evameva kho, maharaja, idhekacco puggalo kusalam kammam cetanaya cetayitva kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjati.
mil3.3.11:3.3: Yepi tassa anusikkhanti, tepi kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjanti.
mil3.3.11:3.4: Evam kho, maharaja, cetayitalakkhana cetana abhisankharanalakkhana ca”ti.
